name: Automatic QR Code Generator – QR Code Composer
author: Sharabindu

sections.description:
This is a WordPress QR Code Generator plugin. It automatically generates QR codes for WordPress pages, posts, WooCommerce products, custom posts, WooCommerce orders, and more.

Easy to install and use. generate dynamic QR codes with automatic display and custom settings. Content can be the current page URL, any text, and any links.

Items in QR Code Generator

Current URL QR Code generator: It works as a QR code generator for all WordPress pages, posts, products, and custom post types. All QR codes are automatically generated and displayed after the content. It will start working as soon as the plugin is activated. This QR code has shortcode support

Custom URL QR Code generator: This QR code generator plugin can generate a QR code for any custom URL or custom text. It is displayed via shortcode.

WooCommerce QR Code generator: This plugin also generates QR codes for woocomemrce products. All single product pages generate and display QR codes. Single product page you can choose 4 types of positions to display the QR code

Email Address QR Code generator: You Can generate a QR code for the email address. No more hassle of memorizing email addresses. Easily share email addresses through QR codes.

QR code generator for Phone/Mobile Number: This plugin will help you generate a QR code for your phone or mobile number. No hassle of remembering phone or mobile number. You can easily share phone/mobile numbers through a QR code.

WhatsApp QR code generator: A WhatsApp QR code is a quick response code that enables users to add contact information of their friends and family to WhatsApp. You can easily generate a WhatsApp QR code with this plugin.

vCard QR Code Generator: A vCard QR code acts as a virtual contact card, allowing you to seamlessly share your contact details on mobile devices. The QR code includes your contact information, such as name, phone number, email address, etc Users can scan the vCard QR code to access their information and save their contacts This plugin is ready to generate a vCard QR code with information

WordPress User Profile vCard QR Code: A unique vCard QR Code will automatically be generated for all users of your WordPress site. It will generate a QR code from a username, email, address, and bio. This vCard QR code can be found on the user’s dashboard. To find the QR code, go to WordPress Dashboard > Users > All Users > Edit a User.

vCard QR Code for WooCommerce customers: With this plugin, WooCommerce website owners will receive vCard QR codes for customers. It will be automatically generated and displayed. The vCard QR code is generated based on the customer’s basic information. This can be found on WooCommerce’s Customer Dashboard page.

= QR code Features=

QR Code in Popup: The Popup QR visibility feature is available in the WordPress QR Code Generator plugin. The front end will display the QR code as a popup instead of a direct QR image. Click on the popup button to see the QR code.

QR Code Visibility on frontend: This is a feature where the frontend will not have the QR image and only the download button will be visible. Clicking the download button will instantly download the QR code.

= Miscellaneous=

  • QR code size customizable

  • Can remove QR codes for specific pages, posts, products, or custom posts

  • Can remove QR codes for specific post types

  • Metabox field supported

Extra Features for Premium

QR code body shape can be added: Body shape can be changed in premium QR code as well a gradient color can be applied to it. The different body shape types are: Square, Dots, Rounded, Extra Rounded, Classy Rounded.Admin Demo for premium version

QR code Eye Frame Shape can be added: Premium version QR code can add different shapes of eye frames and gradient colors can be added to it. Eye Frame Shape types are: Square, Circle, Classy, and Classy rounded.

QR code Eye Ball Shape can be added: Premium version QR code can add different shapes of eyeball and gradient colors can be added to it. Shape types are Square, Circle, and Classy.

Apply gradient color QR code: In the Premium version you can create a gradient color design QR code. You will get the benefit of using gradient colors on the shape of the eye frame, eyeballs, and the body of the QR. This will make the QR codes attractive.

Logo/Image Supported: The premium version allows you to place your website’s Brand logo/image in the center of the QR code. Logo supported.

Woocommerce Order QR Code: WooCommerce site owners After activating the premium version plugin, the plugin will automatically generate order QR codes for each new order and old order. You can control the content of the QR code from the plugin settings page. You can see the order QR code in the WooCommerce order dashboard. Admin Demo for Order QR

Add the order QR code to the order email: After successful completion of an order, the order QR code will be printed in the WooCommerce order email. The customer and store owner will see the QR code in the order email. WooCommerce Orders Email QR Codes can be created from different elements. You have complete control over which elements you want to add to the order QR code. Order email Demo

Bulk vCard QR Code Generator: Bulk vCard QR Codes can be generated based on post type. Suppose you have a custom post type called ‘Developer’. Now looking to create a separate vCard QR for each ‘developer’. Now go to the ‘Developer’ edit page and you will see a meta field called vCard QR. Fill in the required information and save. According to the information, a vCard QR code will be generated for a developer. This way every ‘developer’ can create a vCard QR code. This vCard QR code has an auto-display feature, which can be viewed on the front end and backend. Besides, there are shortcode facilities.

Event management QR Code Generator: Event QR Code is a solution that simplifies event marketing and planning. Currently, event QR code is a very popular medium. With the premium plugin, you can easily generate event QR codes. An event QR code will be generated by providing the event details, time, and event location information. This way you can create as many event QR codes as you want.

Author QR Code Generator: These QR codes are generated based on the basic information of each WordPress author or user. it has a built-in shortcode for display. you can display the QR code in the frontend by using this shortcode in the Author template,

WIFI QR Code Generator: QR code is now widely used to connect to any WiFi network instantly. With the premium version plugin, you can easily generate a wifi QR code. A wifi QR code will be generated by providing information on the wifi type, password, and wifi name.

QR Code Generator for Google Maps: Using QR codes to identify a company or location is becoming increasingly popular. Our premium plugin allows you to generate QR codes for specific locations on Google Maps. For this, input the latitude and longitude values of Google Maps, the QR code of Google Maps will be generated instantly

Elementor QR code generator: If you have the Elementor Page Builder plugin enabled on your WordPress website. Then you can easily create different QR codes with the plugin’s built-in addon. We have added an addon named “QR Code Composer” to create QR codes through Elementor. With this addon, Elementor users can easily generate QR codes from the Elementor editor page. Elementor demo

QR code integration with other plugins

Add order QR code to PDF invoice: The QR Code Composer Pro plugin is now combined with the PDF Invoice and WooCommerce plugin. This means that an order QR code can be included in the PDF invoice. When an order is made, both the seller and the customer will get a PDF invoice featuring a printed order QR code.

QR code for BBPress Plugin: Premium plugin creates QR codes for users of BBPress. It has the ability to generate QR codes and vCard codes based on the profile links or profile information of BBPress members, respectively.

QR code for BuddyPress Plugin This plugin creates QR codes for BuddyPress users. If the BuddyPress plugin is active on your site, you can create QR codes for users’ profile links. Also, you can generate a vCard QR code using the information from users’ profiles.

QR code for Dokan vendor Our Premium plugin is designed to create QR codes compatible with the Dokan plugin. It can generate both QR codes and vCard codes using the link to the Dokan Vendor page or the Vendor’s details.

Other Features

Bulk print QR images as a PDF: This plugin enables users to Print all QR codes according to the type of post. Also, it can retrieve all QR codes from a single page. Admin Demo

Download all Post types of QR codes from one page This plugin allows the download of all QR codes based on Post type. Admin Demo

Download All vCard QR codes from one page The plugin allows the download of all Post types of vCard QR Code Images from One Page. Admin Demo

WordPress Widget: The premium plugin supports the Widget API. This means that you can display the QR code through the WordPress widget. Widget Demo

Shortcode Generator: On the plugin’s settings page, you’ll find a shortcode generator page. From here shortcodes can be generated for all elements. Custom URL QR, WhatsApp QR, WIFI QR, Google Map QR, vCard QR and event QR shortcodes can be created. Also, you can customize a different design, color, logo and animation for each QR code from this shortcode generator page. Check out the live backend demo below View Shortcode Geneator

Privacy

This plugin does not connect to any third-party applications. It does not collect or store any user information. This plugin generates QR code images based only on URLs and your custom content. QR code images are not saved to any file

Feedback

Give any suggestions or feedback, thank you for using or trying our plugin. Please let us know about your experience and rate this plugin.

Frontend Demo | Backend Demo | Docs | Get Pro

Premium QR Code:

Order QR Code for WooCommerce (Pro):

Elementor QR Code Generator (Pro):
sections.installation:
Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress and select Plugins > Add new
Search for “ QR Code Composer”
Click “Install” and “Activate”.
sections.faq:
Will the QR code composer plugin work on all themes?

Yes, this plugin will work on all types of WordPress themes.

How long are the QR codes valid?

its validity Lifetime. QR codes are never Spoiling.

How is the QR code generated? Depending on the Google API?

The QR code is generated from the JavaScript library and does not require Google API dependencies.

Are your QR codes ad-free?

Yes, it is 100% ad-free

If the URL is changed, will the Current Page URL QR code be changed?

Yes, QR Code Composer generates dynamic QR codes, which means if you change the URL of a page or post, the QR code of that particular page or page will automatically change.

Is the QR code image stored somewhere inside WordPress?

No, QR codes are created instantly on the web page.

Where is the QR code location for the WooCommerce Product Page

You can find it Single Product page Tab section, Write the QR code, and you can see it by clicking

I don’t display the QR code on the Page, can it be Possible? Display in the post or only Product product

Yes, you can easily customize from the settings page, which post type you want to display, You can use the turn on/off button, and You have full control of the display
